meanings.definition: Owed money or gratitude to someone.
meanings.sent1: I am debted to my friend for helping me move.
meanings.sent2: She felt debted to her parents for all their support.
meanings.sent3: Feeling debted to others can be a humbling experience.
meanings.sent4: The weight of being debted to someone can feel heavy at times.
meanings.sent5: Being debted to a kind stranger reminded her of the importance of gratitude.

meanings.definition: In a state of owing money or gratitude.
meanings.sent1: The debted man struggled to make ends meet.
meanings.sent2: She felt debted to return the favor to her friend.
meanings.sent3: His debted situation made him appreciate the value of generosity.
meanings.sent4: The debted feeling lingered in the air, creating tension.
meanings.sent5: Being debted to someone can sometimes feel overwhelming and stressful.

meanings.definition: Having a financial obligation to repay a debt.
meanings.sent1: She was debted to the bank for her student loans.
meanings.sent2: The debted company struggled to stay afloat.
meanings.sent3: Being debted to a credit card company can lead to financial stress.
meanings.sent4: The debted individual worked hard to clear their financial obligations.
meanings.sent5: Feeling debted can motivate people to work harder to repay their debts.
